name: PUMP IT UP 2ND ULTIMATE DANCE FLOOR
summary: 4 months after launching the first version of the PUMP, the PUMP IT UP 2ND ULTIMATE DANCE FLOOR added a mass volume of extra songs with variety of foot step patterns.
